about-us-text: Unifortunately is an organization that creates sectoral solutions and innovative products by combining its Software and Engineering experience with Innovation and R&D vision. Our company, which closely follows technology, software and today's world, carries out researches in order to find solutions to the areas where there are deficiencies. Based on this, it implements the innovative ideas that emerge with the right project management.
s-e-using-techs: Using Techs at Software and Engineering
rnd-inno-using-strategies: Using Strategies at RnD and Innovation
notumburada-text: Notum Burada was created by considering the needs of the students and to enable them to earn money at the same time. Students who are members of our platform can sell their notes to other students at their own university who are members of our platform via the Notum Burada Mobile Application, and they can also buy the notes of others with the same logic. In short, it is a platform where students can buy and sell notes.
